originalText.text: I have been a patient of Doctor Condos for over 15 years. The Doctor is excellent and the experience could not be better. Doctor Condos is very thorough in not only checking my teeth but also checking the entire mouth which is very critical for a total health check. The entire experience from the time you enter the office until you leave is very pleasant and you leave with a new toothbrush, floss and toothpaste- a very nice touch. Doctor Condos is also an educator and very aware of all new nuances in dental health. There are many dentists where I live in Staten Island but I prefer to go into Manhattan every 6 months and receive the care I get from Doctor Condos.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Condos since 1984. Yes!! For 40 years!  He is the absolute best.  He is patient and thorough and you never have to wait long to see him.  I have heard stories from friends of incompetent dentists and I feel very lucky to have found Dr. Condos when I was just in college. I actually look forward to going to the dentist. I have several friends that have also had the most positive experience - some have moved out of town and travel back just to get their semi-annual cleaning and check up.  Thank you Dr. Condos for all your years of service.

originalText.text:
Spiro Condos has been my dentist, and my family’s dentist for 25 years.
I trust his skill. Sometimes the treatment is straightforward, fill the cavity,
do a cap. Other times dentistry, like all medicine, is part science and part art.
Sometimes there is more than one possible treatment and I appreciate that he clearly explains the possibilities and helps me make a decision.

His office is well run. His dental assistant, Maryann, is competent and often seems to know what Spiro needs before he asks for it. His office manager, Orin, keeps the office ship on course. He schedules my appointments and emails reminders so I don’t forget.

I recommend my dentist, Spiro Condos, without reservations.

originalText.text: Very happy withDr. Condos. He explains everything in a language I can understand.  His professionalism is fantastic and his staff is on point all the time. I would not think of using another oral surgeon. I would highly recommend his services to anybody looking for a dedicated dentist.

text.text: Very happy withDr. Condos. He explains everything in a language I can understand.  His professionalism is fantastic and his staff is on point all the time. I would not think of using another oral surgeon. I would highly recommend his services to anybody looking for a dedicated dentist.

originalText.text: Dr. Condos repaired my broken front tooth, and it's now indistinguishable from the unbroken one next to it.  While it's possible to find dentists who know the medicine, and some who understand the engineering of teeth, it's rare to fine someone like Dr. Condos who knows the medicine, engineering, and is also an artist.  I've been regularly returning to see Dr. Condos for years now, and my teeth have never been better!
